renderer::RenderMode

renderer::RenderMode Namespace Reference

The way the rendering is performed.


Enumerations

enum  { POINT, LINE, FILL }

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
POINT  Render all vertices as points.
LINE  Render all in wire-frame mode.
FILL  Render all in a normal way.
